title: FIX THE FUKING CLIENT
body: every time i go on a lobby when we banning every thing just froze and they count me dogeing for no reason please fix it because it is very stupid

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs like play.tv, lolrecorder, or overlays?  They've been known to cause issues like crashes in champion select, so remove them if you have any.  Let me know if that helps!
That exact issue happens to me recently, i believe it mostly happens when i Minimize the Client. Might be a coincidence though.
